summary.professional_summary: Creative and detail-oriented frontend developer with 6+ years of experience building responsive, accessible, and performant web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS. Passionate about user experience, design systems, and staying current with frontend technologies.

experience.description: Leading frontend development for a SaaS platform with 50K+ active users
achievements: Architected and implemented a design system using React and Storybook, reducing development time by 30%
Optimized application performance, achieving 95+ Lighthouse scores across all metrics
Led migration from JavaScript to TypeScript, reducing runtime errors by 60%
Mentored 4 junior developers and established frontend coding standards

experience.description: Developed responsive web applications and e-commerce solutions
achievements: Built 15+ responsive websites using React, Next.js, and modern CSS
Implemented PWA features increasing user engagement by 40%
Created reusable component library used across 8 projects
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI designs

experience.description: Developed frontend features for client websites and applications
achievements: Built interactive UI components using vanilla JavaScript and CSS
Implemented responsive designs for mobile-first approach
Optimized website loading speeds by 50% through image optimization
Worked with cross-functional teams in agile development environment

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Modern e-commerce platform built with Next.js, featuring server-side rendering, dynamic routing, and integrated payment processing.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Real-time task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration, and progress tracking.

projects.name: Design System
projects.description: Comprehensive design system with 50+ reusable components, documentation, and Storybook integration.
